description: go-tour: add notes on translating the tour

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go-tour

LGTM.

https://codereview.appspot.com/7311081/diff/1/TRANSLATE
File TRANSLATE (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/7311081/diff/1/TRANSLATE#newcode30
TRANSLATE:30: https://groups.google.com/group/go-tour-commits
this group still needs approval for join.
i think its setting should mirror that of golang-checkins
(anyone can join, only manager can post).

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go-tour/source/detail?r=8abefacdebca ***

go-tour: add notes on translating the tour

R=golang-dev, minux.ma

> i think its setting should mirror that of golang-checkins

Yep, I changed the permissions. The groups management interface is
